alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 30 at 8:25AM AKDT until July 30 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility as low as 1/4 mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway, Eastern Chichagof Island and Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area, to include Elfin Cove, Pelican, Skagway, Hoonah, and Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will negatively impact aviation operations.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
